WEBHOOK.TITLE: Webhook
WEBHOOK.SEARCH_404: Няма резултати отговарящи на тази заявка
WEBHOOK.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Webhooks

Webhooks are HTTP callbacks which can be defined for every account. They are triggered by events like message creation in Cyber1SChat. You can create more than one webhook for this account.

For creating a webhook, click on the Add new webhook button. You can also remove any existing webhook by clicking on the Delete button.

LIST.404: There are no webhooks configured for this account.
LIST.TITLE: Manage webhooks

EDIT.TITLE: Edit webhook
EDIT.DESC: Webhook events provide you the realtime information about what's happening in your CYBER1SChat account. Please enter a valid URL to configure a callback.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Не можа да се свърже с CYBER1SChat сървър. Моля, опитайте отново по-късно

Не можа да се свърже с CYBER1SChat сървър. Моля, опитайте отново по-късно

HELP_TEXT.TITLE: Using Slack Integration
HELP_TEXT.BODY:
Cyber1SChat will now sync all the incoming conversations into the customer-conversations channel inside your slack workplace.

Replying to a conversation thread in customer-conversations slack channel will create a response back to the customer through cyber1schat.

Start the replies with note: to create private notes instead of replies.

If the replier on slack has an agent profile in cyber1schat under the same email, the replies will be associated accordingly.

When the replier doesn't have an associated agent profile, the replies will be made from the bot profile.
